Reviews.Title: Fast shipping
Reviews.Author: Samtacki
Reviews.Content: Great product! still in use today. The tripod ah!! don't use it when it's windy! and let it settle before taking a picture. Other than that, the bag is great, very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: Great backpack
Reviews.Author: Dilmar Mauricio Gamero Santos
Reviews.Content: It is the perfect size for the equipment I use regularly when I take photos.Lowepro has the best backpacks for photo and video equipment and I have several Lowepro bags.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 3 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Lowepro DSLR Video Fastpack 250 AW Digital SLR Camera Backpack Case (Black) +
<2> Precision Design 57" Tripod +
<3> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit
ProductInfo.Name: Lowepro DSLR Video Fastpack 250 AW Digital SLR Camera Backpack Case (Black) with Tripod + Cleaning Kit for Canon EOS 70D, 6D, 5D Mark III, Rebel T3, T5i, SL1, Nikon D3100, D3200, D5200, D7100, D600, D800, Sony Alpha A65, A77, A99
